'''Barahir''' ([[Third Age]] 2290<ref name="Elendil"/> – 2412,<ref name="South">{{App|South}}</ref> aged 122 years) was eighth [[Ruling Steward]] of [[Gondor]].

The [[Watchful Peace]] continued during his rule.<ref>{{App|TA}}</ref>

Barahir ruled as Steward for seventeen years, and was succeeded by his son [[Dior (Steward of Gondor)|Dior]].<ref name="South"/>

==Etymology==
For the meaning of his name refer to [[Barahir#Etymology|Barahir - Etymology]]. Barahir was probably named after the hero of the [[First Age]] who was the father of [[Beren]].<ref>{{NM|P2v}}, footnote 3, p. 189</ref>
